topic.title: Where is everyone? I want a community.
topic.body:
I'm looking for a censorship free community. I'm not personally interested in anything that would be censored, but it's the principal of the thing. I firmly believe that all information should be allowed to be shared. The benefits of truly free speech outweigh the obvious costs.

I tried Dread, Aether, Freenet (can't get it working), and I'm checking out Dispora now. But I keep going back to the censored trash that is reddit. 

Where do you all hang out? Someone invite me please. I can't be the only person who values free speech and privacy, and still wants a community, right?

1625774437_165aBifCkjbWxo7rEf9ZaiCv39Npi.body: Me! I used to feel so edgy as a teen reading through how to make bombs and drugs. But mostly I loved that it was a nice censor free place

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Wassup bitches, where is everyone at? What other chat apps do you use?
